events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will begin processing it shortly.
The application has been categorised under Engineering roles, specifically for the software development team.
A recruiter specialized in engineering has been assigned to your application to ensure a smooth process.
We have completed an initial screening of your resume and background and would like to proceed to technical evaluation.
Thank you for your prompt reply and confirming availability for the upcoming technical interview.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 7th at 2 PM UTC with our lead software developer.
The technical interview was completed successfully, with positive feedback on your problem-solving and coding skills.
We have scheduled an HR interview for May 10th at 11 AM UTC to discuss company culture and benefits.
Your HR interview went very well; all questions were addressed and mutual interest was confirmed.
We have sent you a formal offer including salary details, benefits, and start date options to review.
We have received your feedback regarding the offer and are pleased that you find the terms agreeable.
Thank you for accepting the offer. We are excited to have you join our engineering team.
Your onboarding process has officially started, and you will receive all necessary access and resources shortly.
The hiring process is now complete. Welcome aboard as part of our software engineering team!
